message.body: I will be incommunicado for 10 days. Heading to Italy with my mom. When I think about it, i've been on two international vacations since we started chatt
(1/2)Hello! Life's good. I know it's summer, but it's so cold here! You should count yourself lucky. The last time I went international was a couple years
(2/2)ago! :-) Are you gonna be vacationing in Italy?
Yup! Vacation. We're booked on a tour of Venice, Florence, Rome, Pompeii, Sorento & Capri
That sounds amazing! Have fun! :D My friends and I are thinking of going to maybe Alaska or Miami for the Labor Day weekend. Haven't picked one yet.
I haven't been yet but I think there's more to see there. However, if u only have 4 days, then Miami seems more doable in that short time
(1/3)Exactly! I'd rather take a long-ish vacation and go see everything. There's so much to see in Alaska that 3 days won't do justice, I feel. Plus, it's a
(2/3)little heavy on the pocket as well. :P You said you've lived in FL, right? Where would you go if you had 3 days to spend there? Miami, Orlando, Naples,
I've never spent time in Miami. I'm not a fan of Orlando since it's so touristy. Ft Lauderdale is nice but pricey. I would say the FL Keys. Never been bu
t I'll be going in Sept and everyone always talks about how nice it is.
Of places i've been to, I recommend St Petersburg, FL. It's a historical city with great atmosphere and people and lovely beaches
Thanks a lot for your input! I know nothing about FL, so this info will help me plan a bit.
